title: Tech Leads Stocks Lower as Traders Weigh AI Spending
description: Technology shares declined, dragging the broader stock market lower. Earnings from Microsoft Corp. raised concern about heavy spending on artificial intelligence.
content: Technology shares declined, dragging the broader stock market lower. Earnings from Microsoft Corp. raised concern about heavy spending on artificial intelligence.
